turkish_example_sentence: Gerçeği anlatmayan dürüst olmayan kişi toplumda güven kaybeder.
english_example_sentence: The dishonest person who does not tell the truth loses trust in society.
russian_example_sentence: Нечестный человек, не рассказывающий правду, теряет доверие в обществе.
